version_description:
Homepage Revision
-Revised the searching function, covering: Institution Investors, Celebrities, Terminologies, etc. Eg: Try searching “Satoshi Nakamoto”.
-Adjusted the “Exchanges” module to be at the right of “Hot Searches".
-Added the “Overview

Main Revision
-Revised the watched function, covering: contract can be watched.
-Revised the exchange interface, covering: changes in presentation content and ranking.
-Added the “mobile number login” funtion, which lets you log in by email and

Main Revision
-Revised the K-Line function, covering: raise K-Line speed.
-Revised the profile interface, covering: changes Layout of profile（me).
-Added the “Address of holding”and"Historical data" funtion, which lets you know more info
-Mo

1. Add price reminder function.

2. Add message notification.

3. Optimize the sharing function.

4. Fix some known bug
-Optimize the transaction pairs and contract details pages
